creditline: Museum purchase, Hugh Leander Adams, Mary Trumbull Adams and Hugh Trumbull Adams Princeton Art Fund
inscribed: If these items are removed from the letter it would | become declassified and the Agency would then interpose no | objections to your retention of it.  In order to effectuate | declassification, you should physically excise (with some | sort of bladed instrument used for cutting paper) the items | from the letter, cross out the classification marks and | write the word "Declassified" in place thereof.  You should | then send me a statement confirming the above so the Agency | records in the matter may be complete. | Sincerely, | Alternate Legal Adviser | Publications Review Board
